name: 0 - Outro
_source: speak;Noah; Strangers, you helped save my daughters.{w} I owe you my thanks, and perhaps my life.{w} Girls, you should thank them too.
speak;Noelle; Thank you for saving our village, travelers!{w} Is there any way we can repay you?
speak;Emma; Payment wasn't our goal.{w} Helping people in need is just the right thing to do.
speak;Caroline; Aren't you{tgm}...{tgm}the great Noah?{w} You fought for Sundar, didn't you?
speak;Noelle; ...{tgm}How do you know my dad?;no_talk
speak;Emma; Yeah, Mom, how do you know this man?

speak;Caroline; I've never met him personally,{w} but I know he was a troop commander for Sundar around ten years ago.{w} They say he got badly injured from an ambush that wiped out his division,{w} and that he was quietly let go after.{w} Nobody knows where he'd retired to.
speak;Noah; Nobody <bconvo>knew</> where he'd retired to.
speak;Caroline; So you are him, then?
speak;Noah; ...{tgm}Yes, Sir Noah, 1st Cavalry Division.{w} You are right about who I am, ma'am.{w} Noelle, my daughter here, is in charge of the wyvern brigade defending this village.;no_talk
speak;Emma; Wyvern brigade?{w} I don't see a wyvern brigade.
speak;Noelle; Oh yeah? But you're looking at it.
speak;Noah; Sadly, Noelle is the only one of them left.{w} There's more profitable places for wyvern riders than a small village,{w} and the ones who did stay{tgm}...{tgm}didn't make it.
speak;Noelle; Dad wanted me to be a cavalier like him,{w} but I knew since I was little that I wanted to be a wyvern rider.{w} They're flying scouts to be feared.
speak;Noah; Though, this town didn't always see so much action or danger.{w} Now, though{tgm}...

speak;Noah; When I was a soldier, I lived my life fighting for my country's honor.{w} I fought for a faceless facade who told me I was doing the right thing.{w} They told me my neighbors would thank me and my family would be safe.{w} When my wife fell ill and died, I met the child she left behind, and{tgm}...{tgm}
speak;Noah; It was then I finally realized what my duty had cost me, and I was discreetly replaced.

speak;Noah; I stood at my wife's grave and promised her I would be a father to our daughter.{w} So I'm done with armies.{w} I'm done fighting for higher powers.{w} Now, I raise my sword only for my daughters.
speak;Layla; You{tgm}...{tgm}You fool!{w} Father, what's all this nonsense I'm hearing?
speak;Layla; If you're not going, then I will!
speak;Layla;I know I can do this!
speak;Layla; They were talking about demons attacking, Dad!
speak;Layla;Demons!{w} How does that not make you want to leap into action?

speak;Layla; Dad, please, listen to me!{w} I respect you more than any other man in the world,{w} and I know you gave up being a soldier for Noelle and me,{w} but how can you throw away so much of yourself that you won't even fight evil?{w} You're a warrior at heart!{w} You can't possibly sit by and be happy with yourself!
speak;Layla; Look at me, Dad! Have you seen me fight?{w} I'm not a child anymore.{w} I'm a mage, like Mom was.{w} You can worry all you want, but I can survive on my own!
speak;Noah; Maybe{tgm}...{tgm}Maybe you're right.{w} Thank you for making me see that I can't just stay out of every conflict.{w} You're a good daughter, Layla.
speak;Noah; Caroline{tgm}...{tgm}if these old bones of mine can still serve, I'd like to join you.

speak;Noah; Looks like my girls grew up while I was busy trying to protect them{tgm}...{tgm}{w} They're tougher than I thought. They don't need me to hold their hands.{w} I've raised them the best I could, but Layla's right.{w} I've nothing to fear, and more to lose through inaction.{w} I should fight{tgm}...
speak;Noelle; Oh, well{tgm}...{tgm}I can't be left behind while my family leaves.{w} I guess that means I'm coming with you all.
speak;Man2; Thank you so much for your help.{w} Please, you should stay the night.{w} Some hospitality is the least we could give to show our thanks.
speak;Emma; We would if we could, but we have much to do and far to travel.{w} Your safety is reward enough.
speak;Man2; My, that is a splendid bracelet you're wearing.
speak;Emma; Oh, well thank you.{w} A good friend gave it to me.

speak;Man2; It's a gorgeous gift, but you should be careful.{w} Wearing such a valuable item openly is bound to attract thieves.{w} Ever since Sundar was invaded, these parts have become dangerous.{w} There are gold-hungry thieves and brigands everywhere.{w} The most wicked are Barret's gang.{w} They are{tgm}...{tgm}cruel beyond words.{w} If you have something they want,{w} your life is worth less than nothing to them.{w} Just the other day, they assaulted some travelers for a necklace, and{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Oh, it was an awful sight.
speak;Emma; I{tgm}...{tgm}I can't believe people would stoop so low{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Why would anyone ever think about committing atrocities?

speak;Man2; Oh, the world is coming to an end, and Sundar is finished, mark my words.{w} Demons are attacking us and the umbra are attacking Sundar Castle as we speak!{w} If only the princess was here to help us out of this situation.
speak;Emma; What would she even be able to do to help a situation like this?
